channel.title: [637] Dementhium -- Need help adding bankers
channel.description:
FIXED MY OTHER PROBLEM WITH MAKING MYSELF OWNER! Ignore the bottom stuff!
I need to know how to permanently spawn NPC's. And the NPC's I want are bankers, I have no idea how to do this with dementhium 637.. Could anybody help me out here?

item.title: [637] Dementhium -- Need help adding bankers
item.dc:creator: @EatMyWhiteStuff EatMyWhiteStuff
item.description:
@EatMyWhiteStuff wrote:

EDIT: Fixed. Got what you meant.
Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [637] Dementhium -- Need help adding bankers
item.dc:creator: @Yozora Yozora
item.description:
@Yozora wrote:

Simply log into your server with administrative rights and when typing a command, type “n NPCID ROTATION”. replace NPCID with the id of the NPC, and rotation with the direction you want your NPC to face. The ID for a banker is 44.

Or you could manually add the NPC in the npcspawns.txt file.

Read full topic

item.title: [637] Dementhium -- Need help adding bankers
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

[quote=“EatMyWhiteStuff, post:3, topic:449588”]There’s more to it, I was just showing the part with my username in it.

This is the full code.

public static void loginResponse(Player player) { if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("Jonny"))//STAFF player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(2); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1); if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("")) player.getDefinition().setRights(1); // MessageBuilder bldr = new MessageBuilder(); bldr.writeByte(13); // length bldr.writeByte(player.getRights()); bldr.writeByte(0); bldr.writeByte(0); bldr.writeByte(0); bldr.writeByte(1); bldr.writeByte(0); bldr.writeShort(player.getIndex()); bldr.writeByte(1); bldr.writeMediumInt(0); bldr.writeByte(1); // members player.write(bldr.toMessage()); player.updateRegionArea(); ActionSender.updateMapRegion(player, false); ActionSender.sendLoginInterfaces(player); }[/quote]
Holy crap nuts. Well that certainly explains a lot lol. So, what exactly is your problem? You’re logging in and you still don’t have administrative powers?

Read full topic
